question: William Bentinck reduced the Bhatta by fifty percent. Which of the following refers to as Bhatta?
option3: Allowances paid to the military personnel
answer: Allowances paid to the military personnel
explanation: Bhatta was the allowance that was paid to the military personnel. Many governors-general tried to reduced them but eventually in the year 1828, William Bentinck succeeded to reduce it by fifty percent.
